text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1980. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ==Births== *21 April - Sidney Sampaio, actor *22 April **Rodrigo Hilbert, actor & model **Elaine Mickely, actress & model *22 May - Tiago Leifert, journalist & TV host *13 June - Lígia Mendes, TV host & actress *20 July - Dado Dolabella, actor & singer *20 September - Guilherme Berenguer, actor ==Deaths== ==See also== *1980 in Brazil *List of Brazilian films of 1980
title: 1980 in Brazilian television
